name: combino-sandbox
description: Sandbox example for Combino CLI usage.

scripts.generate:ts: node ../../dist/cli.js templates/base templates/typescript -o output/ts-project -c example.combino --data language=ts
scripts.generate:js: node ../../dist/cli.js templates/base templates/typescript -o output/js-project -c example.combino --data language=js
scripts.generate: npm run generate:ts && npm run generate:js
